description.short: Scrum Easy helps you automate your daily, weekly,monthly standup meetings.
description.full: Scrum Easy is a simple scrum assistant that will enable users to automate their stand-up meetings and provide an easy way for the users to share their daily, weekly, monthly scrum updates. Please visit us at https://www.aimdek.com/scrum-easy-support/ for further help or for getting started.

commands.title: Open settings
commands.description: Opens the settings task module to add or update scrums

commands.title: Help
commands.description: Shows the operations I can perform

commands.title: Start scrum
commands.description: Start a scrum in current channel
